      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Movement of the Earth's crust</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bewegung der Kruste der Masse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mouvement de la croûte de terre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Movimento da crosta de terra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Movimento della crosta terrestre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μετακίνηση της γήινης κρούστας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Movimiento de la corteza de tierra</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows long mountain ridges underneath the ocean made of young rocks indicating the movement of the Earth's crust.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Age</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">crust</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Earth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magma</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Mountains</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">oceans</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">rocks</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sea floor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">tectonic plates</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt lange Gebirgskanten unter 
den Ozean, der von den jungen Felsen gebildet wird, welche die 
Bewegung der Kruste der Masse anzeigen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre de longues arêtes de 
montagne sous l'océan fait de jeunes roches indiquant le mouvement de
la croûte de terre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra cumes longos da montanha
debaixo do oceano feito das rochas novas que indicam o movimento da 
crosta de terra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra le creste lunghe 
della montagna sotto l'oceano fatto delle roccie giovani che indicano 
il movimento della crosta terrestre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει μακριές κορυφογραμμές 
βουνών κάτω από τον ωκεανό φιαγμένο από νέους βράχους που 
δείχνουν τη μετακίνηση της γήινης κρούστας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra cantos largos de la 
montaña por debajo del océano hecho de las rocas jóvenes que 
indican el movimiento de la corteza de tierra.</string>
          </description>
